bwwExcerpt: "In the current Roundabout Theatre Company production at Studio 54-the former disco is an ironic location for this desolate comedy-drama-director Anthony Page and his brilliant cast neatly sidestep that pitfall and dance a merry gig around it. Nathan Lane and Bill Irwin, two of our most skilled stage clowns, find the zestful comic joy and soul-crushing despair in Beckett's sorrowful everymen.
